name: Tales Of Megha
description:
In Tales of Megha, you play as different  clouds  in different situations in an adventurous and colourful environment.

You have been given task by God  to go down to earth and stop the humans from destroying the world anymore and make the Mother Earth happy. 

 You have one day to do it. By the end of the day, if you haven't earned  enough happy points, you will loose and  God will destroy the human race.

Joystick Recommended
